import React, { Fragment, useState } from "react"; import PropTypes from "prop-types"; import { globalConnect } from "../../redux/connect/globalConnect"; function createProfile(props) { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ company: "", website: "", location: "", status: "", skills: [], // comma separated array bio: "", githubUserName: "", experience: [], // array education: [], // array youtube: "", twitter: "", facebook: "", instagram: "", linkedin: "", }); return (

Create Your Profile

Let's get some information to make your profile stand out

* = required field
Give us an idea of where you are at in your career
Could be your own company or one you work for
Could be your own or a company website
City & state suggested (eg. Boston, MA)
Please use comma separated values (eg. HTML,CSS,JavaScript,PHP)
If you want your latest repos and a Github link, include your username
Tell us a little about yourself
Optional
Go Back
); } createProfile.propTypes = {}; export default globalConnect()(createProfile);
